item.title: Tiffaney add a quote by Ray Bradbury
item.description: "There must be something in books, something we can’t imagine, to make a woman stay in a burning house; there must be something there. You don’t stay for nothing." -- Ray Bradbury

item.title: Tiffaney add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "If more of us valued food and cheer and song above hoarded gold, it would be a merrier world." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Tiffaney add a quote by Natalie Goldberg
item.description: "Trust in what you love, continue to do it, and it will take you where you need to go." -- Natalie Goldberg

item.title: Tiffaney add a quote by Stephanie Perkins
item.description: "Seriously, I don't know any American girl who can resist an English accent." -- Stephanie Perkins

item.title: Tiffaney add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "If you are a student you should always get a good nights sleep unless you have come to the good part of your book, and then you should stay up all night and let your schoolwork fall by the wayside, a phrase which means 'flunk'." -- Lemony Snicket
